feed.title: Skylight - Digital government consulting | Talks
feed.subtitle: Skylight is a digital consultancy using design and technology to help government agencies deliver better public services.

entry.title: Modernizing government IT through share-in-savings contracts

link.title: Modernizing government IT through share-in-savings contracts

entry.summary: Chris Cairns and Robert Read join a panel of experts to discuss how to modernize government technology through the marriage of agile practices and share-in-savings contracting.

entry.title: Modernizing government technology through micropurchasing and modular contracting

link.title: Modernizing government technology through micropurchasing and modular contracting

entry.summary: Chris Cairns joins a panel of procurement experts to discuss how to modernize government technology through the creative use of micropurchasing authorities and modular contracting techniques.

entry.title: Choosing the right IoT connectivity solution

link.title: Choosing the right IoT connectivity solution

entry.summary: Geoff Mulligan talks about how to navigate the plethora of IT connectivity solutions and choose the right one.

entry.title: Dissecting the President’s Management Agenda
entry.summary: Chris Cairns joins a panel of government industry experts to break down and discuss the implications of the President's Management Agenda from a technology perspective.

entry.title: Kin Lane’s take on the API industry

link.title: Kin Lane’s take on the API industry

entry.summary: Kin Lane discusses the current state of the API industry, his role as an API evangelist, and where he thinks the industry is going with Matthew Reinbold.

entry.title: Principles for agile procurement
entry.summary: Chris Cairns shares why government IT procurements fail and how to increase their success rate through the adoption of agile procurement principles.

entry.title: Rewriting legacy systems using agile practices

link.title: Rewriting legacy systems using agile practices

entry.summary: Robert Read discusses how to modernize legacy systems using modern agile software development practices.

entry.title: Best practices for pattern matching in Clojure

link.title: Best practices for pattern matching in Clojure

entry.summary: Sean Johnson shares his experience and best practices for simplifying declarative programming via pattern matching in Clojure.
